sentences: Mark Chung (born 3 June 1957, in Leeds, England) is a German musician and music publisher, probably best known for his work as  the bass guitarist of the German band Einst체rzende Neubauten.
From 1980 Chung was a member of the West German post-punk band Abw채rts from Hamburg.
He assumed responsibility for business management of the band until leaving in 1994 to concentrate on his work in the music industry.
In 1996, Chung moved to London, where he became senior vice-president of Sony Music International.
After 9 years with Sony Music, he moved back to Germany and now directs the Freibank office in Berlin.

In 2006, Chung was elected chairman of the German association of independent music companies (Verband unabh채ngiger Musikunternehmen - VUT) and he also sits on the board of the public-private partnership Initiative Musik.
